channel.title: Exercises: Edit Model Classes :: Java Web Development
channel.description: Add functionality to edit event objects in your codingevents application. These exercises assume that you have added all of the code from this section of the book and your application resembles the model-binding branch of CodingEventsJava . Create a new branch from here with a descriptive name, such as edit-events. The edit form will resemble the form used to create an event. Tip As you work through these steps, test your code along the way!
